attributes.action: Re examine the right for Jehovah Witnesses, represented by the Watchtower Organisation, to be recognised as a religion. It is clearly a cult, and should not be exempt from taxation on its "sales" of cult literature within the UK.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Watchtower organisation is not a religion, and uses the bible as cover for its publishing sales operation. It avoids taxation by calling itself a religion. It is a cult, and should not get exemption from UK taxation.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
